name: NSScrollView.Elasticity
desc: These constants determine the elasticity behavior for an axis of the scrollview.

items.name: case automatic
items.desc: Automatically determine whether to allow elasticity on this axis.

items.name: case none
items.desc: Disallow scrolling beyond document bounds on this axis.

items.name: case allowed
items.desc: Allow content to be scrolled past its bounds on this axis in an elastic fashion.
